list.abs: although contamination by human feces is the major concern , animal feces in water may also transmit disease .尽管主要是人类粪便造成的水污染，动物粪便也会污染水源并传播疾病。
mucosa 粘膜mucosanguineous feces 粘液血便mucoserous 粘液浆液性的

...fatty acid binding protein FABP 脂肪酸结合蛋白feces examination 粪便检查fibrin antibody 纤维蛋白抗体
